name: SERRPA
goal:
SERRPA is a consultancy specialized in regulatory and public affairs. It creates value for its clients by helping them to assess risks and opportunities arising from the European political and regulatory landscape. It provides strategic advice, practical support and communication solutions to help clients in the main following areas: food/feed chain, agro-chemicals, pre-market authorisation, raw materials policy, environment biodiversity and sustainability, self-regulation initiatives through safety, environment and sustainability management systems.

Being specialized in the EU institutional dynamic and industry representation, it focusses on creating a constructive and transparent dialog with policy-maker and other stakeholders, based on facts and sound information. Be it on issues or reputation management, SERRPA attaches high importance to ethical values and sustainable business.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives: Food law, Feed additive legislation, feed hygiene, organic farming, GM food and feed, antibiotic resistance, marketing of feed, sustainable development goals, biodiversity.
